评论概述: great jeans but I got to figure out the sizing better
评论详情: I like these pants BUT, in every other denim jean I am a 30" length, sometimes 32 if I want an extra inch or two.  I originally bought a pair with 32 inch length, way tooo long, returned them no problem (great customer service btw) they were repolaced with a 30 inch length, wow, I almost feel I should have gone with a 28" or 26" and I am not exaggerating I have to roll these up at least 4" so I am not dragging hem on the ground.  Maybe I got a mismeasured pair, but I have already washed and worn expecting they would be in the right length so I will live with them but if you can try on a pair at a store before ordering do it so you can make sure your size is right.  FYI I'm 74 inches tall and I've been measured as a 30" length by tailors so it just maybe a Dickies thing or a one-off.

评论概述: Pretty decent and affordable jeans, but QC could be a tad better.
评论详情: I've bought four of these pairs of jeans and all of them have been comfortable, made with good material, and have not given me serious problems whatsoever after 3 months of regular wear. However, one of the pairs of these four jeans that I purchased I had the metal top button break off about two weeks ago and need to be screwed back on, so I added in super glue to ensure it won't come loose again, at least for a while.  It's not a world ending flaw and it was a very easy under 5 minute fix, but it was disappointing that it happened this early on in their use. It probably was just a fluke as I've worn various styles of Dickies pants over the past several years for work and days off and never had one do that before, but I still have to ding some points for that. That being said, despite my one slightly offbeat experience, I would still recommend these to anyone looking for affordable but rugged jeans. Overall about a 7/10 experience thus far and would probably still purchase another pair.
These fit me perfectly. And wear well. 3rd time I'm buying this style.

评论概述: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value priced, meets or exceeds description, works as advertised and is a value.
类型: Size: 34W x 32LColor: Stone Washed Indigo Blue
评论详情: I purchase several things on Amazon and was giving pretty in-depth reviews. From this point on, here's the new agenda…. if it works as advertised, is well made, meets or exceeds the description, is a value, and arrives in a fair amount of time, it will get a "star rating" equal to what my expectations were/are. If it doesn't meet these criteria, then I will most definitely and descriptively tell the short comings of the products and you as a consumer will not have to go through the trouble of buying the product without some background knowledge. If the sell pulls that item and relists under another description, I will put the exact same review on the seller's feedback page. Sellers have done this a couple of times in the past, and I was true to my word then as well as now. DR
The jeans are durable.
Might want to size up if you like a loose fit on waist.

The best jeans I have are a pair of Dickies I bought about a decade ago, but they are finally coming apart. Hoping to replace them, I purchased these jeans.  The length and waist were right (32x34 in my case). The problem though is that they aren't "regular" fit, but probably somewhere between relaxed and loose fit. Way too much material flapping around for anyone but a bodybuilder or otherwise heavy person. It's simply a bad cut.  Photo shows the regular cut jeans I bought a decade ago in the same size as these. Perhaps the fit improves a little if they shrink in the wash, but I don't know as I'm returning them.
I got these to wear as work pants… and the work as expected… I will definitely buy them again

评论概述: Finally an easy decision purchase in the jeans department.
评论详情: For all my guys out there who don't care about the skinny jeans look, we all know the struggle of trying to find a decent pair of pants or jeans in this time. I'm so happy that I came to find this particular brand. So comfortable I'm about to buy five more pairs. I'm ecstatic about finding a pair of jeans that look and feel to my liking and body type. Who would have thought of Dickies would have been the one.  I hope this review works out for you too.

评论概述: Revised good review gone bad due to quality control issues.
评论详情: I recently bought a pair of 505's and really like the feel of the denim but the legs and opening at the bottoms are way too tight. I have been buying Dickies for over 20 years and the only reason for me to look elsewhere is the front pockets! They are way too short! The rest of the jeans are perfect. The fit at my waist is great, the legs are slightly loose and fall just right over shoes or boots. (this is not the case with 505's) If anyone at Dickies is seeing this, Please just make your front pockets longer (the way they used to be!) and I'll give you 5 Stars! I have to take at least one of those stars away as I've found some quality control issues with these jeans. I had only worn one pair of the two I bought. The second pair doesn't fit correctly, they feel like a size smaller. Both are 33×32 but aren't the same. I ended up with one pair that fits well(short front pockets) for the price of two. Which makes Levi's look better and better.

I purchased two of these jeans for my brother who is 6'8. It is difficult to find jeans in his size and these worked out great. The color, fit and feel was as we expected and they didn't shrink after washing.

I literally pressed the 2 button for these. What I got were 2 visually identical pairs, but when I put them on. One had a higher croch and shallower pockets than the other. Not sure I dislike either but not a standard fit for 2 same pairs of pants
